summary: This is an email chain from February 25, 2020, regarding scheduling a meeting concerning Jeffrey Epstein. The correspondence involves individuals from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).

persons.name: Sony
persons.context: Mentioned as being stuck at a location and expected to return to 1SA around 1 PM.

events.title: Epstein Meeting Scheduling
events.description: Email correspondence to schedule a meeting concerning Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated February 25, 2020, concerning a meeting about Jeffrey Epstein.
The correspondence involves the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
An individual named Sony is mentioned as being delayed and expected to return to a location referred to as '1SA'.
